text: Promise Land is an Italian DJ and production duo from Milan, consisting of Nazario Pelusi and Fabio Ranucci. "Why I Still Love You", "Bad DJ", and "Noise" are their main success, respectively ranked 14th, 13th and 23rd in the top 100 established by Beatport. ==Discography== ===Extended plays=== {|
